law.catch_line: A licensed perfusionist shall notify the Board in writing of a change in name or address within 60 d...

section.section: A licensed perfusionist shall notify the Board in writing of a change in name or address within 60 days after the change.
A licensed perfusionist who fails to comply with the requirements of paragraph (1) of this subsection is subject to an administrative penalty of $100.

text.section: Each licensed perfusionist shall display the license conspicuously in the office or place of employment of the licensee.
